CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 9, 1974, pg. 1 reads: "$20,000 From Holy Ghost Fathers - Father Phillip J. Haggerty, C.S.Sp., seated left, presents a $20,000 check to the Rev. Brannon J. Hopson, as the Roman Catholic investment in Black Bank. Fr. Joseph A. Duchene, provincial treasurer, and Richard Barber, chairman of the bank board, look over the action. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four men including Father Phillip J. Haggerty, C.S.Sp., seated left, presenting check to Rev. Brannon J. Hopson, with Fr. Joseph A. Duchene and Richard Barber looking on
